div.script: ;(function($) {var $x = $('.leaderBoard'), hide = false;if ($x.find('> div').length) {if ($x.find('img').length === 0 && $x.find('> div').text() === '') hide = true;} else {hide = true;}if (hide) $x.parent().addClass('hide');})(jQuery);

;(function($) {var $x = $('.topBanner'), hide = false;if ($x.find('> div').length) {if ($x.find('img').length === 0 && $x.find('> div').text() === '') hide = true;} else {hide = true;}if (hide) $x.parent().addClass('hide');})(jQuery);

div.p:
4/2/2020
Longhorn parents and students, please remember to spend time everyday on the course work that is being assigned. Although we are not meeting in our traditional building, educational activities will continue and students are expected to work daily on their courses. Students are also encouraged to spend 30 minutes a day of independent reading. Parents, we appreciate all of your support as we make every effort to . . .
